#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
 int poww(int n,unsigned long int k);
int main()
{
int n,m;
unsigned long int k;
 int ans;
scanf("%d",&m);
while(m--)
{
scanf("%d %lu",&n,&k);
if(k==0)
    ans=1;
else
ans=poww(n,k);
printf("%d\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
 int poww(int n,unsigned long int k)
{
 int a;
if(k==1)
return n%10;
a=(poww(n,k/2))%10;
a=a*a;
if(k%2==0)
return a%10;
else
return (a*n)%10;
}
